This is a story about OMDB Search.

Tech Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Paint 3D, React, Redux Tool Kit, Node.js, mySQL, MyPHP, Express
Class Search for OMDB related entertainment
Description This is a collection of concepts with dictionary definition and analogy appear side by side. The structure of Category, sub-category, term (with dictionary entry) and analogy can be expounded upon by the users.

It is a family-friendly platform with general cordial guidelines so the experience is exciting and fufilling for everyone.

OMDB Search was created to explore other ways of thinking. There are many different ways to learn, this is helpful to those that learn by way of association. My hope is that the library will grow to incorporate many fascinating categories.

This program primarily was created to improve my CRUD and RTK skills. SQL roles are used along with a personal profile for each user.
